subject: College Athletics
Golf
lead_paragraph: U.C.L.A.’s Kevin Chappell shot a 76 to win the N.C.A.A. men’s individual golf championship in West Lafayette, Ind., and help the Bruins hold off Stanford and Southern California for the team title.
snippet: U.C.L.A.’s Kevin Chappell shot a 76 to win the N.C.A.A. men’s individual golf championship in West Lafayette, Ind., and help the Bruins hold off Stanford and Southern California for the team title.
